settings.title: System Settings
settings.label: System Settings
settings.description: Choose the optional rules and mechanics you would like to enable from the options below.

theme.name: Theme
theme.hint: Set this to theme your world for a specific Tiny D8 game

rollerInCharsheet.name: Dice Roller in Character Sheet
rollerInCharsheet.hint: Enable to have a Dice Roller in the Character Sheet.

enableCorruption.name: Enable Corruption Track
enableCorruption.hint: Add a track to the character sheet for Corruption.

enableAdvancement.name: Character Advancement
enableAdvancement.hint: Characters progress either based on a number of sessions or by awarding experience points

enableItemTracking.name: Enable Item Tracking
enableItemTracking.hint: Show slot use for items and calculate remaining inventory slots.

enableDepletionPoints.name: Enable Item Expenditure/Depletion
enableDepletionPoints.hint: When item uses depletion points, track them for character items.

enableCriticalHits.name: Enable Critical Hits
enableCriticalHits.hint: Mark Test as 'Critical Success' when all dice are 6.

enableCriticalFailure.name: Enable Critical Failures
enableCriticalFailure.hint: Mark Test as 'Critical Failures' when all dice are 1

enableVariableWeaponDamage.name: Variable Weapon Damage
enableVariableWeaponDamage.hint: Calculate variable weapon damage for attack tests.

enableDamageReduction.name: Enable Damage Reduction
enableDamageReduction.hint: Armor provides a static damage reduction rating when equipped.

enablePowerOrigin.name: Enable Power Origin
enablePowerOrigin.hint: Adds a text field for your Super Power Origin.

enableWeakness.name: Enable Weakness
enableWeakness.hint: Adds a text field for your Super Weakness.

enablePanic.name: Enable Panic
enablePanic.hint: Adds a counter for keeping track of Panic.

enableRadiation.name: Enable Radiation
enableRadiation.hint: Adds a counter for keeping track of Radiation.

enableGrit.name: Enable Grit
enableGrit.hint: Adds a counter for keeping track of Grit.

wounds.help: Check a box when you suffer damage. Uncheck when healed.

radiation.help: Check a box when you suffer radiation.

corruption.help: Check a box when you suffer corruption. Uncheck if recovered.

panic.help: Uncheck a box when you get Panic. Check when recover. Panic test when Panic is 1.

grit.help: Uncheck a box when you spend Grit.
